text: Gressy was a municipality in the district of Jura-Nord vaudois in the canton of Vaud in Switzerland. Gressy became part of the municipality of Yverdon-les- Bains on on 1 July 2011.Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz published by the Swiss Federal Statistical Office accessed 17 February 2011 == References == Category:2011 disestablishments in Switzerland Category:Former municipalities of Vaud
title: Gressy, Switzerland
